about_the_game:
Furry Farm is a farming simulator RPG!

Start your adventure in Tail Town and bring Furry Farm back to its paws! Roll up your sleeves, grab your tools, and get ready for hard work. Can you make this abandoned farm great again? Who knows… maybe your neighbors can help you out! The townsfolk are not hopeful for the Paw Festival this year, but maybe you can turn things around.

Features:

  • Rebuild the farm: Animals, crops, and maybe even a fishing pond! Find your own way to earn money and restore the farm.

  • 4 Player Co-Op: Invite your friends and play together!

  • Explore the town: Help the city NPCs turn their lives around. Over 20 NPCs with their own side quests.

  • Paw Festival: Coordinate the biggest annual event in Tail Town in your own way.

  • Home: You have a customizable house. Make it functional or just pretty!

  • Cook: Over 50 recipes for you to collect and prepare… but can you gather all the ingredients?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E8200 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X2 240 @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or AMD Radeon HD2900 XT (512MB VRAM with Shader Model 4.0 or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
